        #ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœç½‘é¡µæ ¼å¼ä¸å½“å‰é…ç½®çš„ä¸åŒçš„è¯å°†ä¼šè¢«è‡ªåŠ¨è½¬ç

            root   html;
        }

server {
    #ç›‘å¬80ç«¯å£
    listen 80;
    server_name localhost;
     # individual nginx logs for this web vhost
    access_log /tmp/access.log;
    error_log  /tmp/error.log ;

# è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡

    server {
        #ç›‘å¬80ç«¯å£
        listen 80;
        server_name localhost;
    
        # individual nginx logs for this web vhost
        access_log /tmp/access.log;
        error_log  /tmp/error.log ;
    
        location / {
            #è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡
            #è½®è¯¢ 
            #proxy_pass http://polling_strategy;
            #weightæƒé‡
            #proxy_pass http://weight_strategy;
            #ip_hash
            # proxy_pass http://ip_hash_strategy;
            #fair
            # proxy_pass http://fair_strategy;
            #url_hash
            # proxy_pass http://url_hash_strategy;
            #é‡å®šå‘
            #rewrite ^ http://localhost:8080;
        }
    }
    
    
å¦å¤–ä¸€ç§è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡çš„é…ç½®ï¼š
http {
    upstream upstream_name{
        server 192.168.0.28:8001;
        server 192.168.0.28:8002;
    }
    server {
        listen       8080;
        server_name  localhost;
        location / {
            proxy_pass http://upstream_name;
            proxy_set_header Host $host;
            proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        }
    }
}

# nginxé™æ€æ–‡ä»¶æœåŠ¡å™¨

    1. nginx.confæ–‡ä»¶é…ç½®ï¼š
    1. é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶æœåŠ¡å™¨é…ç½®
server {
      listen       80;
      server_name  8.130.165.67;
      #è®¾ç½®ç¼–ç ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢ä¹±ç 
      charset utf-8;
      set $doc_root /root/mqz/nginx/static-file;
      location / {
            root   $doc_root;
            autoindex     on; #æ˜¯å¦å®‰å…¨åŠ å›ºï¼Œæ‰“å¼€ç›®å½•æµè§ˆ
      }

            root $doc_root;
      }
      location ~* \.(sh|md|gif|jpg|jpeg|png|bmp|ico|swf|css|js)$ {
           root $doc_root;
      }
}
